infoPlist.NSContactsUsageDescription: Ping uses your contacts to help you build your circles and find who you already know on ping.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Ping uses your camera to let you take and upload a profile photo.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Ping uses your photo library to let you choose and upload a profile photo.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: Ping saves your selected profile photo.
